Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.SegmentTransparencySlide Class Reference

Controls the transparency slider functionality for a specific segment of the patient's model in the hand menu. More...

Inheritance diagram for Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.SegmentTransparencySlide:

Public Member Functions

void Initialize ()
 Initializes the slider's position and value based on the target's initial transparency.
 

Public Attributes

GameObject target
 

Private Member Functions

void OnTriggerEnter (Collider other)
 Called when a collider enters the trigger zone and disables the button to prevent bounce effects.
 
void OnTriggerStay (Collider other)
 Called while a collider stays in the trigger zone to update the slider's value and position.
 
void OnTriggerExit (Collider other)
 Called when a collider exits the trigger zone. It enables the button again after a delay.
 
IEnumerator EnableAfterSeconds ()
 Enables the button after a specified delay to mitigate button bounce effects.
 
void executeAction ()
 Updates the transparency of the target GameObject based on the slider's value.
 

Private Attributes

bool buttonPressDisabled = false
 Variable stores if the button is currently disabled.
 
float disableTime = 0.1f
 Time the button is disabled after press to mitigate the bounce effect.
 
float sliderWidth
 
RectTransform handle
 
float upperClamp = .95f
 The upper clamp value for the slider's normalized value.
 
float lowerClamp = .05f
 The lower clamp value for the slider's normalized value.
 

Detailed Description

Controls the transparency slider functionality for a specific segment of the patient's model in the hand menu.
